@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@

+ * questions.

+
+/* @test
+ * @summary Ensure ParseUtil.toURI does not fail when port number is -1
+ * @bug 6380332 8340326
+ * @modules java.base/sun.net.www
+ */
+
+import sun.net.www.ParseUtil;
+
+import java.net.URI;
+import java.net.URL;
+
+public class ParseUtil_6380332 {
+    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
+        URI uri = ParseUtil.toURI(new URL("http://suntea.central.sun.com:-1/servlet/SunTEAServlet"));
+        if (uri == null) {
+            throw new RuntimeException("Test failed: port number -1 should not fail method toURI()");
+        }
+    }
+}
